entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain becoming mixed with drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain or drizzle changing to 30 percent chance of showers in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 late in the morning. High 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
